import { useState } from "react"; const MachineUpdateForm = () => { const [mId, setMId] = useState('') const [maxRunningHrs, setMaxRunningHrs] = useState('') const [product, setProducts] = useState('') const [mFactory, setMFactory] = useState('') const [currentDate, setCurrentDate] = useState('') const [error, setError] = useState(null) const handleSelect=(e)=>{ console.log(e); setProducts(e) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const machine = {mId, maxRunningHrs, product, mFactory, currentDate} const response = await fetch('/api/machine', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(machine), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) const json = await response.json() if (!response.ok) { setError(json.error) } if (response.ok) { setMId('') setMaxRunningHrs('') setProducts('') setMFactory('') setCurrentDate('') setError(null) console.log('New Machine was added succefully.', json) } } return (
